adjectives.description: amazing (comparative more amazing, superlative most amazing)

entries.meaning: Causing wonder and amazement; very surprising.
(informal) Possessing uniquely wonderful qualities; very good.
examples: "I think it was pretty amazing that he picked our school out of a lot of schools to come speak to us about what he has done, and what our country has done, to help us gain our freedom," Mucci said, “sitting next to him was amazing.”
How many things have men found out to the amazing of one another, to the wonderment of one another, to the begetting of endless commendations of one another in the world
